abstract: Large number of celebrities attend opening of acclaimed rap musical Hamilton at Broadway's Richard Rodgers Theater and its after-party at Pier Sixty.
lead_paragraph: The rap musical based on the Ron Chernow biography of Alexander Hamilton, drew the kind of star wattage usually reserved for Hollywood premieres.

headline.main: Celebrities Flock to ‘Hamilton’ Broadway Opening and Party
headline.print_headline: Stars Align for Theater and Politics

snippet: The rap musical based on the Ron Chernow biography of Alexander Hamilton, drew the kind of star wattage usually reserved for Hollywood premieres.
